transfer to the floor. He was sent to the floor on the afternoon
of 6.24 where he remained stable and worked with PT and OT.
On [**7-20**] the patient remained neurologically stable and was seen
again by PT and OT. He was cleared for discharge home, but
wished to stay additional night for safety. After remaining
stable overnight, he was discharged home on [**7-21**].
